docs.lead_paragraph: A recent paper argues that a treatment for obsessive-compulsive disorder has not been sufficiently tested, and that even calling it “therapy” raises people’s hopes beyond what is scientifically supportable.

headline.seo: Concern About Brain Surgery for Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder
headline.main: Wariness on Surgery of the Mind
headline.print_headline: Wariness On Surgery Of the Mind

docs.snippet: A recent paper argues that a treatment for obsessive-compulsive disorder has not been sufficiently tested, and that even calling it “therapy” raises people’s hopes beyond what is scientifically supportable.

docs.lead_paragraph: The government has offered new recommendations that clearly favor the health and well-being of consumers over hard-lobbying farm interests.
